alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:04PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt and northeastern Lander Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 504 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Battle Mountain, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... I-80, Battle Mountain and Valmy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
